name: Tethered (itch) (Spoincer, sleepysunset)
description:
Keep the lizards tethered together throughout the storm!

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021!

Requires two controllers to play

Controls:

  • Left stick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • Exit - Alt + F4 😥

Programming, art, and design - Spencer and Stephen Melnick

(We ran out of time for a UI so you have to restart the exe to restart the game 😅 )
((Also we ran out of time to make/add any sound . Sound is important! - we're just not good at planning...))
